body_html:
Thanks for the quick feedback. I just upgraded to 0.7 and wanted to check the version, which didn't work (must have been still 0.5). I tried another pip --upgrade which still wasn't able to install it properly; this time, I noticed the error during the upgrade.

Cannot remove entries from nonexistent file /Users/Sebastian/miniconda3/envs/py27/lib/python2.7/site-packages/easy-install.pth

which may have prevented the correct installation. So, it must be some problem on my side (just installed in my python 3 environment were it works perfectly fine. Sorry for bothering.

body:
Thanks for the quick feedback. I just upgraded to 0.7 and wanted to check the version, which didn't work (must have been still 0.5). I tried another `pip --upgrade` which still wasn't able to install it properly; this time, I noticed the error during the upgrade. 

```
Cannot remove entries from nonexistent file /Users/Sebastian/miniconda3/envs/py27/lib/python2.7/site-packages/easy-install.pth
```

which may have prevented the correct installation. So, it must be some problem on my side (just installed in my python 3 environment were it works perfectly fine. Sorry for bothering.
